caption:
Table 1. PSNR results from three test datasets KODAK, BSD300, 
and SET14 for Gaussian, Poisson, and Bernoulli noise. The com-
parison methods are BM3D, Inverse Anscombe transform (ANSC), 
and deep image prior (DIP).
